channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
How do you make items drop like this..
Man 1: Drops a whip and ashes Man 2: Drops 37 mind runes and ashes Man 3: Drops 56 nature runes and ashes.
I know its something to do with misc.random but on my server it doesn't have the method and even I do the misc.random would make it go 1,2,3,4,5 right?

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @SandScape SandScape
item.description:
@SandScape wrote:

[quote=“Ash™, post:2, topic:260200”]Misc.random lol?
NpcDrops.CFG

Or NPChandler.java[/quote]npchandler.java Fail
you code the drops in npcdrops.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: Need help

item.description:
@Simon2 wrote:

[quote=“Ash™, post:2, topic:260200”]Misc.random lol?
NpcDrops.CFG

Or NPChandler.java[/quote]
Well done mr fucking captain obvious.
Lol at you seriously…

  1. You can’t code
  2. You don’t know half the shit you post
  3. Yes misc.random is used with intergers you should know that mr.mstr codar@!
  4. Don’t you think I would of tried NPChandler.java anyway
  5. How the fuck do you have 23 rep?
